alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Knott; Leslie; Magoffin; Martin; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 5:45PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Martin, southern Johnson, north central Leslie, northern Perry, Knott, northwestern Floyd, central Breathitt and southern Magoffin Counties through 615 PM EST... At 545 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Foraker to Mosley Bend. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mason, Royalton, West Royalton Station, Skaggs, Sublett, Conley Station, Swampton, Marshallville, Bradley and Carver around 550 PM EST. Riceville, Ivyton, Gypsy, Brainard and Rowdy around 555 PM EST. Fisty, Talcum, Emmalena, Bonanza, Dobson, Ritchie, Leander, Ary, Swamp Branch and Patrick around 600 PM EST. Prestonsburg, Hindman, Auxier, Tina, Bays Branch, Nero, Oaklawn Estates, East Point, Vest and Van Lear around 605 PM EST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Pippa Passes, Soft Shell, Odds, Garner, Yellow Mountain, Leburn, Dicks Creek, Ivis, Mallie, Brinkley, Estill, Wayland, Mousie, Larkslane, Davisport, Betty, Hollybush, Glo, Bolyn and Porter Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Knott; Leslie; Magoffin; Martin; Perry
